metadata.title: Thursday, 25th June, 2020
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a milk processing plant in Monze District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether there are any irrigation schemes that are non-operational, countrywide;
(b) if so, how many are non-operational;
(d) what measures the Government is taking to revamp the non-operational schemes; and
(e) whether the Government has any plans to establish irrigation schemes in Chifunabuli Parliamentary Constituency by 2021.
